DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine prevalence risk factor diabetes , hypertension , hyperlipidemia among Thai muslim population age 35-75 year .
DOC.detailed_description: This cross-sectional study conduct Bangkok surround province . Approximately 1500 participant enrol . Study staff interview participant basic demographic data , health status , physical activity , food frequency 24-hour recall . Anthropometry ( body weight , height , hip waist circumference ) physical assessment ( blood pressure ) measure . Ten milliliter venous blood drawn venipuncture 12 h overnight fast determination fast plasma glucose ( FPG ) blood lipid concentration ( total cholesterol , triglyceride , HDL-cholesterol ) . FPG measure enzymatic colorimetric method glucose oxidase.21 Total cholesterol determine cholesterol oxidase method serum triglyceride concentration determine standardized enzymatic procedure use glycerol phosphate oxidase assay.22 , 23 HDL- cholesterol measure enzymatic assays.24 LDL cholesterol calculate accord method Friedwald et al.25 All sample analyze internal quality control meet acceptable criterion . Intra-and inter-assay CVs 2.01 % 3.01 % FPG , 1.87 % 4.24 % total cholesterol , 0.93 % 11.6 % triacylglycerols , 0.99 % 1.49 % HDL cholesterol , respectively .
